Teachers accused of inappropriate behaviour by pupils will be granted anonymity unless charged. Mr Michael Gove said: The whole trend in the last 25-30 years has been away from respect for teachers and towards pupils saying,' I know my rights'. "I want to restore respect for teachers. The public are clear that we need to improve behaviour. The Bill will also set out plans for free schools and a curriculum shake-up. Teaching unions and Labour are opposed to the changes.
